title: Greece throws support behind social media bans for kids
summary_full: Athens joins several EU countries eyeing bans – Greek PM Kyriakos Mitsotakis said on Thursday that if talks with tech companies fail then regulation is needed
summary_public: Athens joins several EU countries eyeing bans – Greek PM Kyriakos Mitsotakis said on Thursday that if talks with tech companies fail then regulation is needed

GR.label: positive
GR.evidence: Greece throws support behind social media bans for kids
